c3-s4.ipa: ɦúː ɕiěj ɖʉùː ɲìn ʣip ʨɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ʥip ɕɨə̀ː .
c3-s4.tupa: ghouq sjiejh dru njin dzip tjy ue djip sjyo

c3-s5.ipa: kóː hɨ̀j lɑp kʷək pit ʥiéː ɦʉot .
c3-s5.tupa: koq hyj lap kweok pit djieq uot

c3-s7.ipa: nə́j ʈièː sʷɑ̌n ɦọk ʨiáː ʈʉùŋ ŋʷɑ̌j ʂɨə́ː ɖʉóŋ .
c3-s7.tupa: neojq trie swanh ghoeuk tjiaeq trung ngwajh sryoq druongq

c3-s8.ipa: kị̀m pèn ɖiàŋ ʨɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ sʷìː pʉùː ɕɨ̌ŋ ʂʉǒː .
c3-s8.tupa: kyim pen driaeng tjy juongh swi pu sjyngh sruoh

c3-s35.ipa: sɑ̀m ʨʰiak ʨɨ̀ː dùŋ jiak nə̀ŋ sʷɑ̌n jiáː .
c3-s35.tupa: sam tjhiaek tjy doung jiaek neong swanh jiaeq

c3-s38.source: 試問九萬八千七百六十五乘三千四百五十六。
c3-s38.ipa: ɕɨ̌ː mʉ̌n kʉúː mʉǒn pẹt ʦʰèn ʦʰit pạk lʉuk ʥip ŋóː ʑɨ̀ŋ sɑ̀m ʦʰèn sǐː pạk ŋóː ʥip lʉuk .
c3-s38.tupa: sjyh munh kuq muonh peet tshen tshit paek luk djip ngoq zjyng sam tshen sih paek ngoq djip luk

c3-s41.ipa: nə́j liàŋ kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː sʷɑ̌n ʨɨ̀ː .
c3-s41.tupa: neojq liaeng kyj khyih swanh tjy

c3-s43.source: 乘九萬八千七百六十五以三千四百五十六。
c3-s43.ipa: ʑɨ̀ŋ kʉúː mʉǒn pẹt ʦʰèn ʦʰit pạk lʉuk ʥip ŋóː jɨ́ː sɑ̀m ʦʰèn sǐː pạk ŋóː ʥip lʉuk .
c3-s43.tupa: zjyng kuq muonh peet tshen tshit paek luk djip ngoq jyq sam tshen sih paek ngoq djip luk

c3-s46.source: 三億四千一百三十三萬一千八百四十
c3-s46.ipa: sɑ̀m ʔɨk sǐː ʦʰèn ʔit pạk sɑ̀m ʥip sɑ̀m mʉǒn ʔit ʦʰèn pẹt pạk sǐː ʥip
c3-s46.tupa: sam qyk sih tshen qit paek sam djip sam muonh qit tshen peet paek sih djip

c3-s47.source: 又算有繁複非一步所能得者。
c3-s47.ipa: ɦʉǔː sʷɑ̌n ɦʉúː bʉòn pʉuk pʉ̀j ʔit bǒː ʂɨə́ː nə̀ŋ tək ʨiáː .
c3-s47.tupa: uh swanh uq buon puk puj qit boh sryoq neong teok tjiaeq

c3-s49.ipa: kạ̀ː ʦʰit ʥip ŋóː jɨ́ː ɲǐː .
c3-s49.tupa: kae tshit djip ngoq jyq njih

c3-s51.ipa: kẹ́m gɨ̀ː jɨ́ː sɑ̀m ʥip lʉuk .
c3-s51.tupa: keemq gy jyq sam djip luk

c3-s56.ipa: pẹt pạk ɲǐː ʥip pẹt ɦʉǔː ŋóː pʉ̀n
c3-s56.tupa: peet paek njih djip peet uh ngoq pun

c3-s58.ipa: ɦʉúː ɖɨə̀ː ʂʉǒː jɨə́ː bịěː ɖɨə̀ː ʂʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː pịet .
c3-s58.tupa: uq dryo sruoh jyoq byeh dryo sruoh tjy pyet

c3-s59.ipa: ʥiéː ɦʉ̌j ɖɨə̀ː pʉop mʉòː kạ̀w ɦʷɑ̌n lʷit jiáː .
c3-s59.tupa: djieq ujh dryo puop muo kaew ghwanh lwit jiaeq

c3-s60.ipa: kị̀m ŋɨə̀n ɖɨə̀ː kạp jɨ́ː ʔịt ʨiáː .
c3-s60.tupa: kyim ngyon dryo kaep jyq qyit tjiaeq

c3-s65.ipa: jiak kʰɑ́ː ɕɨə̀ː ɖɨə̀ː ʔịt ʔɨə̀ː kạp .
c3-s65.tupa: jiaek khaq sjyo dryo qyit qyo kaep

c3-s68.ipa: ɲɨ̀ː kạ̀ː ʑɨ̀ŋ ɦʉúː kạ̀w ɦʷɑ̌n lʷit ʨiáː .
c3-s68.tupa: njy kae zjyng uq kaew ghwanh lwit tjiaeq

c3-s71.ipa: ɦʉúː pʉùː nə̀ŋ ʨiáŋ ɖɨə̀ː ʨiáː .
c3-s71.tupa: uq pu neong tjiaengq dryo tjiaeq

c3-s72.ipa: pʉùː jʉok tək ɕɨɑ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː siéw ʂʉǒː .
c3-s72.tupa: pu juok teok sjyang tjy siewq sruoh

c3-s73.ipa: nə́j ŋʉǒn tək gɨ̀ː jɨə̀ː ʂʉǒː .
c3-s73.tupa: neojq nguonh teok gy jyo sruoh

c3-s80.ipa: jɨ́ː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ kạ̀ː kẹ́m ʑɨ̀ŋ ɖɨə̀ː ʨɨ̀ː pʉop .
c3-s80.tupa: jyq djyangh kae keemq zjyng dryo tjy puop

c3-s84.source: 曩者朱氏算學啟蒙有大數之類。
c3-s84.ipa: nɑ́ŋ ʨiáː ʨʉòː ʥiéː sʷɑ̌n ɦọk kʰéj mùŋ ɦʉúː dɑ̌j ʂʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː lʷǐː .
c3-s84.tupa: nangq tjiaeq tjuo djieq swanh ghoeuk khejq moung uq dajh sruoh tjy lwih

c3-s86.ipa: ɲièn gɨ́n ɕiěj tɑ̀ː pʉùː jʉǒŋ .
c3-s86.tupa: njien gynq sjiejh ta pu juongh

c3-s125.ipa: sòn ʦɨ́ː sʷɑ̌n kèŋ ɦʉúː mʉ̌n ɦịèn .
c3-s125.tupa: son tsyq swanh keng uq munh yen

c3-s126.ipa: kị̀m ɦʉúː ɖíː tʰǒː dùŋ lùŋ .
c3-s126.tupa: kyim uq driq thoh doung loung

c3-s127.ipa: ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɦʉúː sɑ̀m ʥip ŋóː dùː .
c3-s127.tupa: djyangh uq sam djip ngoq dou

c3-s129.ipa: mʉ̌n ɖíː tʰǒː kɑk kɨ́j ɦɑ̀ː .
c3-s129.tupa: munh driq thoh kak kyjq gha

c3-s145.ipa: ɲǐː ʥip sɑ̀m ʔit ʥip ɲǐː
c3-s145.tupa: njih djip sam qit djip njih

c3-s146.source: 吾聞有善詼諧者注此解曰。
c3-s146.ipa: ŋòː mʉ̀n ɦʉúː ʥién kʰòj ɦẹ̀j ʨiáː ʨʉǒː ʦʰiéː kẹ́ː ɦʉot .
c3-s146.tupa: ngo mun uq djienq khoj gheej tjiaeq tjuoh tshieq keeq uot

c3-s147.ipa: kị̀m ɦʉúː nə̀ŋ gị̀m ɕʉǔː ŋɨə́ː ʨiáː .
c3-s147.tupa: kyim uq neong gyim sjuh ngyoq tjiaeq

c3-s151.ipa: ʥiéː ʥɨ̀ː ʦʉok ʂʉǒː ɦỵèː hɨɑ̌ŋ ʨiáː ʨɨ̀ː pɑ̌n .
c3-s151.tupa: djieq djy tsuok sruoh ue hyangh tjiaeq tjy panh

c3-s152.ipa: kǒː ɦʉot ɖɨə̀ː ʦʉok jɨ́ː ɲǐː .
c3-s152.tupa: koh uot dryo tsuok jyq njih

c3-s153.ipa: ʥiéː ɲìn ɦʉǔː ɦʉúː liǎŋ ɦʉot .
c3-s153.tupa: djieq njin uh uq liaengh uot

c3-s154.ipa: ɖíː tʰǒː bʉǔː kɑk kɨə́ː ʔit ʦʉok .
c3-s154.tupa: driq thoh buh kak kyoq qit tsuok

c3-s155.ipa: kǒː ɦʉot kẹ́m gɨ̀ː jɨ́ː dùː .
c3-s155.tupa: koh uot keemq gy jyq dou

c3-s159.ipa: kǒː ʂʉǒː ʥiéː ʥɨ̀ː ʨɨ̀ː ʦʉok .
c3-s159.tupa: koh sruoh djieq djy tjy tsuok

c3-s163.ipa: kẹ́m dùː jɨ́ː tʰǒː kʰɑ́ː tək .
c3-s163.tupa: keemq dou jyq thoh khaq teok

c3-s165.ipa: nə́j ɦʉúː lʉùː ɕɨ̌ŋ ʨɨ̀ː pʉùŋ lʉùː .
c3-s165.tupa: neojq uq lu sjyngh tjy pung lu

c3-s167.ipa: zʷǐː ʦɑ̀w lièː ʂịàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ʦʰə́m ɦʷɑ́ː .
c3-s167.tupa: zwih tsaw lie sryaeng tjy tsheomq ghwaq

c3-s168.ipa: ʨʉóː ɲìn zʷìn ɲit bʉǔː lìm .
c3-s168.tupa: tjuoq njin zwin njit buh lim

c3-s169.ipa: ʥɨɑ̌ŋ kěn dùː ŋóː pạk ʦʰit ʥip kʉúː .
c3-s169.tupa: djyangh kenh dou ngoq paek tshit djip kuq

c3-s170.source: 下見足二千二百八十四。
c3-s170.ipa: ɦạ́ː kěn ʦʉok ɲǐː ʦʰèn ɲǐː pạk pẹt ʥip sǐː .
c3-s170.tupa: ghaeq kenh tsuok njih tshen njih paek peet djip sih

c3-s171.source: 問何以編程求雉兔之數。
c3-s171.ipa: mʉ̌n ɦɑ̀ː jɨ́ː pèn ɖiàŋ gʉùː ɖíː tʰǒː ʨɨ̀ː ʂʉǒː .
c3-s171.tupa: munh gha jyq pen driaeng gu driq thoh tjy sruoh

c3-s173.ipa: dɑ́n jiak ɕʉúː kʉǒː kʰɑ́ː ɦɨ́ː .
c3-s173.tupa: danq jiaek sjuq kuoh khaq yq

c3-s175.ipa: ɦʉot ŋóː pạk ʦʰit ʥip kʉúː .
c3-s175.tupa: uot ngoq paek tshit djip kuq

c3-s176.ipa: ɦʉot ɲǐː ʦʰèn ɲǐː pạk pẹt ʥip sǐː .
c3-s176.tupa: uot njih tshen njih paek peet djip sih

c3-s179.ipa: zʷǐː tək ɖíː ʔit ʥip lʉuk .
c3-s179.tupa: zwih teok driq qit djip luk

c3-s180.ipa: tʰǒː ŋóː pạk lʉuk ʥip sɑ̀m .
c3-s180.tupa: thoh ngoq paek luk djip sam

c3-s181.ipa: ɦʷɑ̀ŋ lòn dùː ʦʉok ʨɨ̀ː tɑ̀ː ɕiéw .
c3-s181.tupa: ghwang lon dou tsuok tjy ta sjiewq

c3-s186.source: 古勒拿有九首四足一尾之怪。
c3-s186.ipa: kóː lək ɳạ̀ː ɦʉúː kʉúː ɕʉúː sǐː ʦʉok ʔit mʉ́j ʨɨ̀ː kʷẹ̌j .
c3-s186.tupa: koq leok nrae uq kuq sjuq sih tsuok qit mujq tjy kweejh

c3-s188.source: 山海經載南山有狐九尾。
c3-s188.ipa: ʂẹ̀n hə́j kèŋ ʦə́j nə̀m ʂẹ̀n ɦʉúː ɦòː kʉúː mʉ́j .
c3-s188.tupa: sreen heojq keng tseojq neom sreen uq gho kuq mujq

c3-s190.ipa: sòn ɕʉuk ŋɑ̀w ʥɨɑ̀ŋ kěn lɨɑ́ŋ dùː ʑiàː .
c3-s190.tupa: son sjuk ngaw djyang kenh lyangq dou zjiae

c3-s192.ipa: ɦʷẹk sǐː kʷẹ̌j kɑk ɲɨɑk kɑ̀n .
c3-s192.tupa: ghweek sih kweejh kak njyak kan

c3-s194.ipa: ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɦʉúː sɑ̀m pạk sǐː ʥip dùː .
c3-s194.tupa: djyangh uq sam paek sih djip dou

c3-s196.ipa: ɦạ́ː ɦʉúː ɲǐː pạk ʥip lʉuk ʦʉok .
c3-s196.tupa: ghaeq uq njih paek djip luk tsuok

c3-s217.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː .
c3-s217.tupa: miaeng tjy uot hyoq gho ghwa

c3-s218.ipa: ʑɨ̀ŋ hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː jɨ́ː ʥip .
c3-s218.tupa: zjyng hyoq gho ghwa jyq djip

c3-s219.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot ʥip bój hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː .
c3-s219.tupa: miaeng tjy uot djip bojq hyoq gho ghwa

c3-s221.ipa: kẹ́m gɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ʥip bój hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː .
c3-s221.tupa: keemq gy jyq djip bojq hyoq gho ghwa

c3-s223.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot lɨɑ́ŋ dùː ʑiàː .
c3-s223.tupa: miaeng tjy uot lyangq dou zjiae

c3-s224.ipa: kẹ́m mʉ́j jɨ́ː lɨɑ́ŋ dùː ʑiàː .
c3-s224.tupa: keemq mujq jyq lyangq dou zjiae

c3-s225.ipa: kẹ́m gɨ̀ː jɨ́ː hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː .
c3-s225.tupa: keemq gy jyq hyoq gho ghwa

c3-s227.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot kʉúː mʉ́j ɦòː .
c3-s227.tupa: miaeng tjy uot kuq mujq gho

c3-s228.ipa: kẹ́m hɨə́ː ɦòː ɦʷɑ̀ː jɨ́ː kʉúː mʉ́j ɦòː .
c3-s228.tupa: keemq hyoq gho ghwa jyq kuq mujq gho

c3-s229.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot hɨə́ː tək ləp .
c3-s229.tupa: miaeng tjy uot hyoq teok leop

c3-s230.source: 夫「許德拉」夫「九尾狐」夫「刑天」夫「兩頭蛇」。
c3-s230.ipa: bʉòː hɨə́ː tək ləp bʉòː kʉúː mʉ́j ɦòː bʉòː ɦèŋ tʰèn bʉòː lɨɑ́ŋ dùː ʑiàː .
c3-s230.tupa: buo hyoq teok leop buo kuq mujq gho buo gheng then buo lyangq dou zjiae

c3-s233.source: 一十二 三十四 一十六 九十九
c3-s233.ipa: ʔit ʥip ɲǐː sɑ̀m ʥip sǐː ʔit ʥip lʉuk kʉúː ʥip kʉúː
c3-s233.tupa: qit djip njih sam djip sih qit djip luk kuq djip kuq

c3-s234.source: 其解法蓋與雉兔同籠相類。
c3-s234.ipa: gɨ̀ː kẹ́ː pʉop kɑ̌j jɨə́ː ɖíː tʰǒː dùŋ lùŋ sɨɑ̀ŋ lʷǐː .
c3-s234.tupa: gy keeq puop kajh jyoq driq thoh doung loung syang lwih

c3-s237.ipa: kạ̌ŋ ɦʉúː ɦỵèn ʨʉùː mịt lʷit .
c3-s237.tupa: kaengh uq uen tju myit lwit

c3-s239.ipa: dɑ̌j jién gʉùː ʔit ʨɨə̀ː ʑʷit ʨiáː .
c3-s239.tupa: dajh jienq gu qit tjyo zjwit tjiaeq

c3-s241.ipa: kǒː lʉùː də́j ɦúː ʨɨɑ̀ŋ jiáː .
c3-s241.tupa: koh lu deojq ghouq tjyang jiaeq
